name: THEN AND NOW
tag_list: fashion, ecommerce, discount, shopping, online-shopping, luxury, international, buying, retail, designer, women, men, children, home, exclusive, limited-edition
overview:
Designer fashion found in the top stores combined with key pieces from previous seasons and one off exclusive designer items. Your one-stop-shop for women’s, men’s and kids’ fashion as well as must-have homeware.

THEN AND NOW is an innovation from Lian Michelson an ex- Morgan Stanley, City banker who created the growing website to meet the needs of working professionals like herself, time starved to shop online, efficiently.

www.ThenAndNowShop.com is the ultimate destination for designer fashion, offering both current collections as well as discounted past seasons at up to 75% off RRP.

The site has a great mix of known brands and emerging designers for women, men, kids and the home. Enjoy brands such as YSL, Guiseppe Zanotti, and See by Chloe at half price, as well as the hottest new collections from brands such as Halston Heritage, Cutler and Gross, Rake and many more.

On top of this, the site offers a unique and exciting shopping experience by combining THEN AND NOW products with products from some of the top stores around the globe , including My-Wardrobe, The Outnet, LN-CC & Mr Porter, allowing our customers to browse all their favourites brands and shopping sites in one place, www.ThenAndNowShop.com

Why shop anywhere else?
